physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 13 x 9 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#114, C. M. Schayer's store on 409 Blake St circa 1874, wholesale dealers in liquors, wines & cigars; donated by Mr. Charles Schayer.''

mods.abstract: Exterior of the C.M. Schayer Store owned by Charles M. Schayer, with a sign posted at the top of the building. Eight unidentified men and children stand in front and on a balcony. The store was located at 409 Blake Street in Denver, Colorado. Charles and Ricka Saft Schayer arrived in Denver by covered wagon in 1865.
